techmeme.title: Spotify launches Offline Backup, a playlist of downloaded songs that users recently listened to, available automatically for Premium users (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Analysis: Nvidia execs and directors have sold nearly 11M shares, worth $1.8B+, in 2024 so far, the most since at least 2020; there are 24.5B outstanding shares (Bloomberg)
Gurbir Grewal, the US SEC's top enforcement official since 2021, who oversaw 2,400+ enforcement actions and the crypto crackdown, plans to leave on October 11 (Nicola M. White/Bloomberg)
Barcelona-based Submer, which submerges data center server racks in its proprietary coolant, raised a $55.5M Series C at a ~$500M post-money valuation (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)

Analysis: London's Met police used facial recognition 117 times in 2024 to August, up from 32 times in total from 2020 to 2023; ~770,966 people were scanned (Yasemin Craggs Mersinoglu/Financial Times)
